changeSet.author: Tim van der Leeuw
changeSet.sql: CREATE ALIAS IF NOT EXISTS INSERT_MESSAGE FOR "nl.nn.adapterframework.jdbc.H2TestProcedures.insertMessage"; CREATE ALIAS IF NOT EXISTS GET_MESSAGES_BY_CONTENT FOR "nl.nn.adapterframework.jdbc.H2TestProcedures.selectByContent";

rollback.sql: DROP ALIAS INSERT_MESSAGE; DROP ALIAS GET_MESSAGES_BY_CONTENT;
